name: repave
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put a new hard, flat surface on an area of ground: Plans to repave roads and improve lighting could be delayed or abandoned if the cuts go ahead. Before moving in, they repaved the drive and updated the wiring in the house.
More examplesFewer examplesThe council plans to repave the road and add amenities such as a snack bar.Drivers say that fixing potholes and repaving streets would be the best way to make their roads more drivable.He spent £4,000 painting the house and repaving the drive.
